short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AppInSource Connect. For Partners and Friends, Video conferencing and screen sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AppInSource Connect is a Chrome Plugin for AppInSource Customers, Partners and Friends to carry out video conferencing and screen sharing in a secure, simple and cost-free manner.
